title: [SOLVED]820-3115- works fine with charger but slow on battery
message:
hi guys,
liquid damage machine , cleaned and replaced isl twice , checked with few batteries but no luck. the problem is that it works fine when charger is plugged in but if charger is not plugged in it becomes slow and jerky , but as soon as the charger is plugged in it becomes completely fine.
( i have this issue with 2 more machines but the other one i believe is 820-2936 but i will check it to confirm and may be will open another thread for that later on )

kindly advise
thanks

title: [SOLVED]820-3115- works fine with charger but slow on battery
[SOLVED]820-3115- works fine with charger but slow on battery
message:
ok , will update you tomorrow after changing it 
thanks

title: [SOLVED]820-3115- works fine with charger but slow on battery
message:
Q7055 has nothing to do with that!

Run ASD and check for sensor issues. Likely corrosion around Q5300/10 area.

title: [SOLVED]820-3115- works fine with charger but slow on battery
message: Duke is right, I read wrong, sorry for that....

title: [SOLVED]820-3115- works fine with charger but slow on battery
message:
hi guys, 
                         thanks for the reply , just finished fixing the traces of q5300 and now it is completely working fine , 
thanks both of you for advice 
we can now put this thread as solved
